baseMass.description: Mass present at all times, regardless of lift state

6t.label: 6.0 t (fixed only)
6t.notes: Only fixed superstructure ballast. Deck ballast not installed.

23.5t.label: 23.5 t (6.0 + 17.5)
23.5t.notes: Deck ballast transferred to superstructure. Total crane mass remains 65 t.

40.1t.label: 40.1 t (6.0 + 17.5 + 16.6)
40.1t.notes: Additional ballast added. Crane mass increases beyond base mass.

outriggers.notes: Conservative static carrier load share for AT cranes on full outriggers

disclaimers: Ground bearing values are conservative planning estimates.
Final loads must be confirmed by the Appointed Person / Temporary Works Engineer.
